Amitava Chakraborty  
​
30/1A A.C. Banerjee Road Ariadaha, Kolkata: 700057, West Bengal ​
E-mail: amitavachakraborty012@gmail.com  
Contact: (+91) 8777216784 ​
LinkedIn: Amitava Chakraborty  
  
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
Motivated and detail-oriented MBA candidate at the Institute of Engineering and Management, 
specializing in Marketing with plans to pursue a second specialization in Supply Chain and 
Management. Strong academic foundation in Psychology, Economics, Political Science. Adept at 
understanding consumer behaviour, market trends and strategic business operations.  
 
SKILLS & COMPETENCIES  
Technical Skills:  
●​ MS Word (Table & Chart, Mail Merge, Document Automation)  
●​ MS Excel (VLOOKUP & HLOOKUP, Data Management, Pivot Tables)  
●​ MS PowerPoint (Data Visualization, Professional Presentation Design)  
Soft Skills:  
●​ Communication & Leadership  
●​ Team Collaboration & Management  
●​ Time Management & Problem-Solving  
●​ Analytical Thinking & Decision Making  
 
INTERNSHIP EXPERIENCE   
Aditya Birla Fashion & Retail Ltd. (Internship) | Duration: 30 Days  
●​ Assisted in Operations Management and as a Marketing Intern ensuring 100% 
accuracy.  
●​ Managed and analysed product distribution to optimise inventory efficiency.  
●​ Coordinate operations and product placement for improved customer experience.
